Protocols/UserCourseView.html#/c:@M@Mapb.name: update(location:pitch:direction:animated:tracksUserCourse:)
Protocols/UserCourseView.html#/c:@M@Mapb.abstract: Updates the view to reflect the given location and other camera properties.

Protocols/TunnelIntersectionManagerDeleg.name: tunnelIntersectionManager(_:willEnableAnimationAt:)
Protocols/TunnelIntersectionManagerDeleg.abstract: Called immediately when the location manager detects a user will enter a tunnel.

Protocols/TunnelIntersectionManagerDeleg.name: tunnelIntersectionManager(_:willDisableAnimationAt:)
Protocols/TunnelIntersectionManagerDeleg.abstract: Called immediately when the location manager detects the user will exit a tunnel.

Protocols/StyleManagerDelegate.html#/c:@.name: locationFor(styleManager:)
Protocols/StyleManagerDelegate.html#/c:@.abstract: Asks the delegate for a location to use when calculating sunset and sunrise.

Protocols/StyleManagerDelegate.html#/c:@.name: styleManager(_:didApply:)
Protocols/StyleManagerDelegate.html#/c:@.abstract: Informs the delegate that a style was applied.

Protocols/StyleManagerDelegate.html#/c:@.name: styleManagerDidRefreshAppearance(_:)
Protocols/StyleManagerDelegate.html#/c:@.abstract: Informs the delegate that the manager forcefully refreshed UIAppearance.

Protocols/VoiceControllerDelegate.html#/.name: voiceController(_:spokenInstructionsDidFailWith:)
Protocols/VoiceControllerDelegate.html#/.abstract: Called when the voice controller failed to speak an instruction.

Protocols/VoiceControllerDelegate.html#/.name: voiceController(_:didInterrupt:with:)
Protocols/VoiceControllerDelegate.html#/.abstract: Called when one spoken instruction interrupts another instruction currently being spoken.

Protocols/VoiceControllerDelegate.html#/.name: voiceController(_:willSpeak:routeProgress:)
Protocols/VoiceControllerDelegate.html#/.abstract: Called when a spoken is about to speak. Useful if it is necessary to give a custom instruction instead. Noting, changing the distanceAlongStep property on SpokenInstruction will have no impact on when the instruction will be said.

Protocols/NavigationMapViewCourseTrackin.name: navigationMapViewDidStartTrackingCourse(_:)
Protocols/NavigationMapViewCourseTrackin.abstract: Tells the receiver that the map is now tracking the user course.

Protocols/NavigationMapViewCourseTrackin.name: navigationMapViewDidStopTrackingCourse(_:)
Protocols/NavigationMapViewCourseTrackin.abstract: Tells the receiver that tracksUserCourse was set to false, signifying that the map is no longer tracking the user course.

Other Protocols.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavigat.name: BimodalCache
Other Protocols.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavigat.abstract: A cache consists of both in-memory and on-disk components, both of which can be reset.

Protocols/NavigationMapViewCourseTrackin.name: NavigationMapViewCourseTrackingDelegate
Protocols/NavigationMapViewCourseTrackin.abstract: The NavigationMapViewCourseTrackingDelegate provides methods for responding to the NavigationMapView starting or stopping course tracking.

Protocols/VoiceControllerDelegate.html.name: VoiceControllerDelegate
Protocols/VoiceControllerDelegate.html.abstract: The VoiceControllerDelegate protocol defines methods that allow an object to respond to significant events related to spoken instructions.

Protocols/StyleManagerDelegate.html.name: StyleManagerDelegate
Protocols/StyleManagerDelegate.html.abstract: The StyleManagerDelegate protocol defines a set of methods used for controlling the style.

Protocols/TunnelIntersectionManagerDeleg.name: TunnelIntersectionManagerDelegate
Protocols/TunnelIntersectionManagerDeleg.abstract: The TunnelIntersectionManagerDelegate protocol provides methods for responding to events where a user enters or exits a tunnel.

Protocols/UserCourseView.html.name: UserCourseView
Protocols/UserCourseView.html.abstract: A view that represents the userâ€™s location and course on a NavigationMapView.

Extensions/UIDevice.html#/c:@CM@MapboxNa.name: isPluggedIn
Extensions/UIDevice.html#/c:@CM@MapboxNa.abstract: Returns a Bool whether the device is plugged in. Returns false if not an iOS device.

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS16MapboxNavi.name: nonEmptyString
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS16MapboxNavi.abstract: Check if the current string is empty. If the string is empty, nil is returned, otherwise, the string is returned.

Extensions/UIWindow.html#/s:So8UIWindowC.name: capture()
Extensions/UIWindow.html#/s:So8UIWindowC.abstract: Returns a screenshot of the current window

Extensions/RouteStep.html#/s:16MapboxDir.name: isMotorway
Extensions/RouteStep.html#/s:16MapboxDir.abstract: Returns true if the route step is on a motorway.

Extensions/RouteStep.html#/s:16MapboxDir.name: lastInstruction
Extensions/RouteStep.html#/s:16MapboxDir.abstract: Returns the last instruction for a given step.

Extensions/RouteOptions.html#/s:16Mapbox.name: without(waypoint:)
Extensions/RouteOptions.html#/s:16Mapbox.abstract: Returns a copy of RouteOptions without the specified waypoint.

Extensions/Notification/Name.html#/s:So1.name: navigationSettingsDidChange
Extensions/Notification/Name.html#/s:So1.abstract: Posted when something changes in the shared NavigationSettings object.

Extensions/Notification/Name.html#/s:So1.name: routeControllerDidFailToReroute
Extensions/Notification/Name.html#/s:So1.abstract: Posted when RouteController fails to reroute the user after the user diverges from the expected route.

Extensions/Notification/Name.html#/s:So1.name: routeControllerWillReroute
Extensions/Notification/Name.html#/s:So1.abstract: Posted after the user diverges from the expected route, just before RouteController attempts to calculate a new route.

Extensions/Notification/Name.html#/s:So1.name: routeControllerDidReroute
Extensions/Notification/Name.html#/s:So1.abstract: Posted when RouteController obtains a new route in response to the user diverging from a previous route.

Extensions/Notification/Name.html#/s:So1.name: routeControllerProgressDidChange
Extensions/Notification/Name.html#/s:So1.abstract: Posted when RouteController receives a user location update representing movement along the expected route.

Extensions/Notification/Name.html#/s:So1.name: routeControllerDidPassSpokenInstructionPoint
Extensions/Notification/Name.html#/s:So1.abstract: Posted when RouteController detects that the user has passed an ideal point for saying an instruction aloud.

Extensions/Locale.html#/s:10Foundation6L.name: preferredLocalLanguageCountryCode
Extensions/Locale.html#/s:10Foundation6L.abstract: Given the app’s localized language setting, returns a string representing the user’s localization.

Extensions/Dictionary.html#/s:s10Diction.name: multiplied(by:)
Extensions/Dictionary.html#/s:s10Diction.abstract: Returns a copy of the stop dictionary with each value multiplied by the given factor.

Extensions/CLLocation.html#/s:So10CLLoca.name: dictionaryRepresentation
Extensions/CLLocation.html#/s:So10CLLoca.abstract: Returns a dictionary representation of the location.

Extensions/CGPoint.html#/s:SC7CGPointV16.name: distance(to:)
Extensions/CGPoint.html#/s:SC7CGPointV16.abstract: Calculates the straight line distance between two CGPoint.

Extensions/Bundle.html#/s:So6BundleC16Ma.name: backgroundModes
Extensions/Bundle.html#/s:So6BundleC16Ma.abstract: Returns a set of strings containing supported background mode types.

Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa16MapboxNavig.name: locations(from:)
Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa16MapboxNavig.abstract: Initializes a [CLLocation] from a JSON string at a given filePath.

Enums/FeedbackType.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavi.name: general
Enums/FeedbackType.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavi.abstract: Indicates general feedback. You should provide a description string to RouteController.recordFeedback() to elaborate on the feedback if possible.

Enums/FeedbackType.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavi.name: accident
Enums/FeedbackType.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavi.abstract: Identifies the feedback as the location of an accident or crash

Enums/FeedbackType.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavi.name: hazard
Enums/FeedbackType.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavi.abstract: Identifies the feedback as the location of a road hazard such as debris, stopped vehicles, etc.

Enums/FeedbackType.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavi.name: roadClosed
Enums/FeedbackType.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavi.abstract: Identifies the feedback as the location of a closed road that should not allow vehicles

Enums/FeedbackType.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavi.name: notAllowed
Enums/FeedbackType.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavi.abstract: Identifies the feedback as a maneuver that isn’t allowed. For example, if a user is instructed to make a left turn, but the turn isn’t allowed.

Enums/FeedbackType.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavi.name: missingRoad
Enums/FeedbackType.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavi.abstract: Identifies the feedback as the location of a road that should exist along the route.

Enums/FeedbackType.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavi.name: missingExit
Enums/FeedbackType.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavi.abstract: Identifies the feedback as a maneuver with missing exit information such as an exit number or destination sign.

Enums/FeedbackType.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavi.name: routingError
Enums/FeedbackType.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavi.abstract: Identifies the feedback as the location of a poor instruction or route choice. This could be used to indicate an ambiguous or poorly-timed turn announcement, or a set of confusing turns.

Enums/FeedbackType.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavi.name: confusingInstruction
Enums/FeedbackType.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavi.abstract: Identifies the feedback as the location of a confusing instruction.

Enums/FeedbackType.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavi.name: reportTraffic
Enums/FeedbackType.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavi.abstract: Identifies the feedback as a place where traffic should have been reported.

Enums/FeedbackType.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavi.name: mapIssue
Enums/FeedbackType.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavi.abstract: Identifies the feedback as a general map issue.

Enums/MBErrorCode.html#/s:16MapboxNaviga.name: spokenInstructionFailed
Enums/MBErrorCode.html#/s:16MapboxNaviga.abstract: A spoken instruction failed to be read aloud.

Enums/SpokenInstructionErrorCode.html#/s.name: audioPlayerFailedToPlay
Enums/SpokenInstructionErrorCode.html#/s.abstract: The audio player failed to play audio data.

Enums/SpokenInstructionErrorCode.html.name: SpokenInstructionErrorCode
Enums/SpokenInstructionErrorCode.html.abstract: Enum used for indicating the type of error occured while speaking an instruction.

Enums/FeedbackType.html.name: FeedbackType
Enums/FeedbackType.html.abstract: Feedback type is used to specify the type of feedback being recorded with RouteController.recordFeedback().

Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.name: MBRouteLineWidthByZoomLevel
Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.abstract: A stop dictionary representing the default line widths of the route line by zoom level when NavigationMapViewDelegate.navigationMapView(_:routeStyleLayerWithIdentifier:source:) is undefined.

Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.name: NavigationMapViewMinimumDistanceForOverheadZooming
Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.abstract: The minium distance remaining on a route before overhead zooming is stopped.

Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.name: MBCurrentLegAttribute
Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.abstract: Attribute name for the route line that is used for identifying whether a RouteLeg is the current active leg.

Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.name: MBCongestionAttribute
Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.abstract: Attribute name for the route line that is used for identifying different CongestionLevel along the route.

Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.name: NavigationViewMinimumVolumeForWarning
Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.abstract: The minimum volume for the device before a gentle warning is emitted when beginning navigation.

Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.name: NavigationMetricsDebugLoggingEnabled
Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.abstract: :nodoc This is used internally for debugging metrics

Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.name: RouteControllerLinkedInstructionBufferMultiplier
Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.abstract: For shorter upcoming steps, we link the AlertLevel.high instruction. If the upcoming step duration is near the duration of RouteControllerHighAlertInterval, we need to apply a bit of a buffer to prevent back to back notifications.

Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.name: RouteSnappingMinimumSpeed
Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.abstract: The minimum speed value before the user’s actual location can be considered over the snapped location.

Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.name: RouteControllerMinimumDistanceForContinueInstruction
Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.abstract: The minimum distance threshold used for giving a Continue type instructions.

Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.name: RouteControllerMinimumBacktrackingDistanceForRerouting
Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.abstract: The minimum distance in the opposite direction of travel that triggers rerouting.

Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.name: RouteControllerMinimumNumberLocationUpdatesBackwards
Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.abstract: Minimum number of consecutive location updates moving backwards before the user is rerouted.

Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.name: RouteControllerNumberOfSecondsForRerouteFeedback
Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.abstract: Number of seconds reroute feedback sections are shown in the feedback view after the user is rerouted.

Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.name: RouteControllerProactiveReroutingInterval
Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.abstract: The number of seconds between attempts to automatically calculate a more optimal route while traveling.

Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.name: RouteSnappingMaxManipulatedCourseAngle
Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.abstract: Maximum angle the user puck will be rotated when snapping the user’s course to the route line.

Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.name: RouteSnappingMinimumHorizontalAccuracy
Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.abstract: Minimum Accuracy (maximum deviation, in meters) that the route snapping engine will accept before it stops snapping.

Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.name: RouteControllerMinNumberOfInCorrectCourses
Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.abstract: Minimum number of consecutive incorrect course updates before rerouting occurs.

Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.name: RouteControllerIncorrectCourseMultiplier
Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.abstract: Given a location update, the horizontalAccuracy is used to figure out how many consective location updates to wait before rerouting due to consecutive incorrect course updates.

Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.name: RouteControllerMinimumDistanceToTunnelEntrance
Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.abstract: Minimum distance to flag the proximity to an upcoming tunnel intersection on the route.

Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.name: RouteControllerMinimumSpeedAtTunnelEntranceRadius
Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.abstract: Minimum speed (mps) as the user enters the minimum radius of the tunnel entrance on the route.

Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.name: RouteControllerMaximumSpeedForUsingCurrentStep
Other Global Variables.html#/s:16MapboxN.abstract: When calculating the user’s snapped location, this constant will be used for deciding upon which step coordinates to include in the calculation.

Classes/UserPuckCourseView.html#/c:@M@Ma.name: update(location:pitch:direction:animated:tracksUserCourse:)
Classes/UserPuckCourseView.html#/c:@M@Ma.abstract: Transforms the location of the user puck.

Classes/SimulatedLocationManager.html#/c.name: speedMultiplier
Classes/SimulatedLocationManager.html#/c.abstract: Specify the multiplier to use when calculating speed based on the RouteLegâ€™s expectedSegmentTravelTimes.

Classes/SimulatedLocationManager.html#/c.name: init(route:)
Classes/SimulatedLocationManager.html#/c.abstract: Initalizes a new SimulatedLocationManager with the given route.

Classes/SimulatedLocationManager.html#/c.name: init(routeProgress:)
Classes/SimulatedLocationManager.html#/c.abstract: Initalizes a new SimulatedLocationManager with the given routeProgress.

Classes/ReplayLocationManager.html#/c:@M.name: speedMultiplier
Classes/ReplayLocationManager.html#/c:@M.abstract: speedMultiplier adjusts the speed of the replay.

Classes/NavigationSettings.html#/c:@M@Ma.name: voiceVolume
Classes/NavigationSettings.html#/c:@M@Ma.abstract: The volume that the voice controller will use.

Classes/NavigationSettings.html#/c:@M@Ma.name: voiceMuted
Classes/NavigationSettings.html#/c:@M@Ma.abstract: Specifies whether to mute the voice controller or not.

Classes/NavigationMatchOptions.html#/c:@.name: init(waypoints:profileIdentifier:)
Classes/NavigationMatchOptions.html#/c:@.abstract: Initializes a navigation route options object for routes between the given waypoints and an optional profile identifier optimized for navigation.

Classes/NavigationMatchOptions.html#/c:@.name: init(locations:profileIdentifier:)
Classes/NavigationMatchOptions.html#/c:@.abstract: Initializes a navigation match options object for routes between the given locations and an optional profile identifier optimized for navigation.

Classes/NavigationMatchOptions.html#/c:@.name: init(coordinates:profileIdentifier:)
Classes/NavigationMatchOptions.html#/c:@.abstract: Initializes a navigation match options object for routes between the given geographic coordinates and an optional profile identifier optimized for navigation.

Classes/NavigationRouteOptions.html#/c:@.name: init(waypoints:profileIdentifier:)
Classes/NavigationRouteOptions.html#/c:@.abstract: Initializes a navigation route options object for routes between the given waypoints and an optional profile identifier optimized for navigation.

Classes/NavigationRouteOptions.html#/c:@.name: init(locations:profileIdentifier:)
Classes/NavigationRouteOptions.html#/c:@.abstract: Initializes a navigation route options object for routes between the given locations and an optional profile identifier optimized for navigation.

Classes/NavigationRouteOptions.html#/c:@.name: init(coordinates:profileIdentifier:)
Classes/NavigationRouteOptions.html#/c:@.abstract: Initializes a route options object for routes between the given geographic coordinates and an optional profile identifier optimized for navigation.

Classes/MapboxVoiceController.html#/c:@M.name: timeoutIntervalForRequest
Classes/MapboxVoiceController.html#/c:@M.abstract: Number of seconds a request can wait before it is canceled and the default speech synthesizer speaks the instruction.

Classes/MapboxVoiceController.html#/c:@M.name: stepsAheadToCache
Classes/MapboxVoiceController.html#/c:@M.abstract: Number of steps ahead of the current step to cache spoken instructions.

Classes/MapboxVoiceController.html#/c:@M.name: speakWithDefaultSpeechSynthesizer(_:error:)
Classes/MapboxVoiceController.html#/c:@M.abstract: Speaks an instruction with the built in speech synthesizer.

Classes/MapboxVoiceController.html#/c:@M.name: downloadAndCacheSpokenInstruction(instruction:)
Classes/MapboxVoiceController.html#/c:@M.abstract: Caches an instruction in an in-memory cache.

Classes/DayStyle.html.name: DayStyle
Classes/DayStyle.html.abstract: DefaultStyle is default style for Mapbox Navigation SDK.

Classes/NightStyle.html.name: NightStyle
Classes/NightStyle.html.abstract: NightStyle is the default night style for Mapbox Navigation SDK. Only will be applied when necessary and if automaticallyAdjustStyleForSunPosition.

Other Classes.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavigatio.name: GenericRouteShield
Other Classes.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavigatio.abstract: GenericRouteShield is a class to render routes that do not have route-shields.

Classes/MapboxVoiceController.html.name: MapboxVoiceController
Classes/MapboxVoiceController.html.abstract: MapboxVoiceController extends the default RouteVoiceController by providing a more robust speech synthesizer via the Mapbox Speech API. RouteVoiceController will be used as a fallback during poor network conditions.

Other Classes.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavigatio.name: NavigationLocationManager
Other Classes.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavigatio.abstract: NavigationLocationManager is the base location manager which handles permissions and background modes.

Classes/NavigationRouteOptions.html.name: NavigationRouteOptions
Classes/NavigationRouteOptions.html.abstract: A NavigationRouteOptions object specifies turn-by-turn-optimized criteria for results returned by the Mapbox Directions API.

Classes/NavigationMatchOptions.html.name: NavigationMatchOptions
Classes/NavigationMatchOptions.html.abstract: A NavigationMatchOptions object specifies turn-by-turn-optimized criteria for results returned by the Mapbox Map Matching API.

Other Classes.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavigatio.name: NavigationView
Other Classes.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavigatio.abstract: A view that represents the root view of the MapboxNavigation drop-in UI.

Classes/ReplayLocationManager.html.name: ReplayLocationManager
Classes/ReplayLocationManager.html.abstract: ReplayLocationManager replays an array of locations exactly as they were

Classes/SimulatedLocationManager.html.name: SimulatedLocationManager
Classes/SimulatedLocationManager.html.abstract: The SimulatedLocationManager class simulates location updates along a given route.

Classes/StyleManager.html.name: StyleManager
Classes/StyleManager.html.abstract: A manager that handles Style objects. The manager listens for significant time changes

Classes/UserPuckCourseView.html.name: UserPuckCourseView
Classes/UserPuckCourseView.html.abstract: A view representing the userâ€™s location on screen.

Configuration.html#/s:16MapboxNavigation.name: RouteControllerDeadReckoningTimeInterval
Configuration.html#/s:16MapboxNavigation.abstract: When calculating whether or not the user is on the route, we look where the user will be given their speed and this variable.

Configuration.html#/s:16MapboxNavigation.name: RouteControllerHighAlertInterval
Configuration.html#/s:16MapboxNavigation.abstract: Number of seconds left on step when a AlertLevel.high alert is emitted.

Configuration.html#/s:16MapboxNavigation.name: RouteControllerManeuverZoneRadius
Configuration.html#/s:16MapboxNavigation.abstract: Radius in meters the user must enter to count as completing a step. One of two heuristics used to know when a user completes a step, see RouteControllerMaximumAllowedDegreeOffsetForTurnCompletion.

Configuration.html#/s:16MapboxNavigation.name: RouteControllerMaximumAllowedDegreeOffsetForTurnCompletion
Configuration.html#/s:16MapboxNavigation.abstract: Threshold user must be in within to count as completing a step. One of two heuristics used to know when a user completes a step, see RouteControllerManeuverZoneRadius.

Configuration.html#/s:16MapboxNavigation.name: RouteControllerMaximumDistanceBeforeRecalculating
Configuration.html#/s:16MapboxNavigation.abstract: Maximum number of meters the user can travel away from step before RouteControllerShouldReroute is emitted.

Configuration.html#/s:16MapboxNavigation.name: RouteControllerMediumAlertInterval
Configuration.html#/s:16MapboxNavigation.abstract: Number of seconds left on step when a AlertLevel.medium alert is emitted.

Configuration.html#/s:16MapboxNavigation.name: RouteControllerUserLocationSnappingDistance
Configuration.html#/s:16MapboxNavigation.abstract: Accepted deviation excluding horizontal accuracy before the user is considered to be off route.

Classes/DistanceFormatter.html#/c:@M@Map.name: string(from:)
Classes/DistanceFormatter.html#/c:@M@Map.abstract: Returns a more human readable String from a given CLLocationDistance.

Classes/DistanceFormatter.html#/c:@M@Map.name: attributedString(for:withDefaultAttributes:)
Classes/DistanceFormatter.html#/c:@M@Map.abstract: Returns an attributed string containing the formatted, converted distance.

Classes/DistanceFormatter.html.name: DistanceFormatter
Classes/DistanceFormatter.html.abstract: Provides appropriately formatted, localized descriptions of linear distances.

Classes/Style.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavigatio.name: tintColor
Classes/Style.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Sets the tint color for guidance arrow, highlighted text, progress bar and more.

Classes/Style.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavigatio.name: fontFamily
Classes/Style.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Sets the font family for all labels.

Classes/Style.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavigatio.name: styleType
Classes/Style.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Describes the situations in which the style should be used. By default, the style will be used during the daytime.

Classes/Style.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavigatio.name: mapStyleURL
Classes/Style.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Map style to be used for the style.

Classes/Style.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavigatio.name: apply()
Classes/Style.html#/c:@M@MapboxNavigatio.abstract: Applies the style for all changed properties.

Classes/Style.html.name: Style
Classes/Style.html.abstract: Style is a convenient wrapper for styling the appearance of various interface components throughout the Navigation UI.

Extensions/MGLMapView.html#/s:So10MGLMap.name: showsTraffic
Extensions/MGLMapView.html#/s:So10MGLMap.abstract: Toggle traffic on a map style that contains a Mapbox Traffic source.

Protocols/NavigationMapViewDelegate.html.name: navigationMapView(_:routeStyleLayerWithIdentifier:source:)
Protocols/NavigationMapViewDelegate.html.abstract: Asks the receiver to return an MGLStyleLayer for routes, given an identifier and source.

Protocols/NavigationMapViewDelegate.html.name: navigationMapView(_:waypointStyleLayerWithIdentifier:source:)
Protocols/NavigationMapViewDelegate.html.abstract: Asks the receiver to return an MGLStyleLayer for waypoints, given an identifier and source.

Protocols/NavigationMapViewDelegate.html.name: navigationMapView(_:waypointSymbolStyleLayerWithIdentifier:source:)
Protocols/NavigationMapViewDelegate.html.abstract: Asks the receiver to return an MGLStyleLayer for waypoint symbols, given an identifier and source.

Protocols/NavigationMapViewDelegate.html.name: navigationMapView(_:routeCasingStyleLayerWithIdentifier:source:)
Protocols/NavigationMapViewDelegate.html.abstract: Asks the receiver to return an MGLStyleLayer for route casings, given an identifier and source.

Protocols/NavigationMapViewDelegate.html.name: navigationMapView(_:didSelect:)
Protocols/NavigationMapViewDelegate.html.abstract: Tells the receiver that the user has selected a route by interacting with the map view.

Protocols/NavigationMapViewDelegate.html.name: navigationMapView(_:didSelect:)
Protocols/NavigationMapViewDelegate.html.abstract: Tells the receiver that a waypoint was selected.

Protocols/NavigationMapViewDelegate.html.name: navigationMapView(_:shapeFor:)
Protocols/NavigationMapViewDelegate.html.abstract: Asks the receiver to return an MGLShape that describes the geometry of the route.

Protocols/NavigationMapViewDelegate.html.name: navigationMapView(_:simplifiedShapeFor:)
Protocols/NavigationMapViewDelegate.html.abstract: Asks the receiver to return an MGLShape that describes the geometry of the route at lower zoomlevels.

Protocols/NavigationMapViewDelegate.html.name: navigationMapView(_:shapeFor:legIndex:)
Protocols/NavigationMapViewDelegate.html.abstract: Asks the receiver to return an MGLShape that describes the geometry of the waypoint.

Protocols/NavigationMapViewDelegate.html.name: navigationMapView(_:imageFor:)
Protocols/NavigationMapViewDelegate.html.abstract: Asks the receiver to return an MGLAnnotationImage that describes the image used an annotation.

Protocols/NavigationMapViewDelegate.html.name: navigationMapView(_:viewFor:)
Protocols/NavigationMapViewDelegate.html.abstract: Asks the receiver to return an MGLAnnotationView that describes the image used an annotation.

Protocols/NavigationMapViewDelegate.html.name: navigationMapViewUserAnchorPoint(_:)
Protocols/NavigationMapViewDelegate.html.abstract: Asks the receiver to return a CGPoint to serve as the anchor for the user icon.

Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/c:@M@Map.name: defaultAltitude
Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/c:@M@Map.abstract: Returns the altitude that the map camera initally defaults to.

Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/c:@M@Map.name: zoomedOutMotorwayAltitude
Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/c:@M@Map.abstract: Returns the altitude the map conditionally zooms out to when user is on a motorway, and the maneuver length is sufficently long.

Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/c:@M@Map.name: longManeuverDistance
Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/c:@M@Map.abstract: Returns the threshold for what the map considers a long-enough maneuver distance to trigger a zoom-out when the user enters a motorway.

Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/c:@M@Map.name: tapGestureDistanceThreshold
Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/c:@M@Map.abstract: Maximum distance the user can tap for a selection to be valid when selecting an alternate route.

Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/s:16Mapb.name: navigationMapDelegate
Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/s:16Mapb.abstract: The object that acts as the navigation delegate of the map view.

Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/s:16Mapb.name: courseTrackingDelegate
Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/s:16Mapb.abstract: The object that acts as the course tracking delegate of the map view.

Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/s:16Mapb.name: tracksUserCourse
Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/s:16Mapb.abstract: Determines whether the map should follow the user location and rotate when the course changes.

Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/c:@M@Map.name: userCourseView
Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/c:@M@Map.abstract: A UIView used to indicate the userâ€™s location and course on the map.

Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/c:@M@Map.name: showRoutes(_:legIndex:)
Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/c:@M@Map.abstract: Adds or updates both the route line and the route line casing

Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/c:@M@Map.name: removeRoutes()
Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/c:@M@Map.abstract: Removes route line and route line casing from map

Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/c:@M@Map.name: showWaypoints(_:legIndex:)
Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/c:@M@Map.abstract: Adds the route waypoints to the map given the current leg index. Previous waypoints for completed legs will be omitted.

Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/c:@M@Map.name: addArrow(route:legIndex:stepIndex:)
Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/c:@M@Map.abstract: Shows the step arrow given the current RouteProgress.

Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/c:@M@Map.name: removeArrow()
Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/c:@M@Map.abstract: Removes the step arrow from the map.

Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/c:@M@Map.name: localizeLabels()
Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/c:@M@Map.abstract: Attempts to localize road labels into the local language and other labels

Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/c:@M@Map.name: setOverheadCameraView(from:along:for:)
Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/c:@M@Map.abstract: Sets the camera directly over a series of coordinates.

Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/c:@M@Map.name: recenterMap()
Classes/NavigationMapView.html#/c:@M@Map.abstract: Recenters the camera and begins tracking the user’s location.

Classes/NavigationMapView.html.name: NavigationMapView
Classes/NavigationMapView.html.abstract: NavigationMapView is a subclass of MGLMapView with convenience functions for adding Route lines to a map.

Protocols/NavigationMapViewDelegate.html.name: NavigationMapViewDelegate
Protocols/NavigationMapViewDelegate.html.abstract: The NavigationMapViewDelegate provides methods for configuring the NavigationMapView, as well as responding to events triggered by the NavigationMapView.

Extensions/MGLMapView.html.name: MGLMapView
Extensions/MGLMapView.html.abstract: An extension on MGLMapView that allows for toggling traffic on a map style that contains a Mapbox Traffic source.

Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/c:@M@Map.name: distanceTraveled
Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/c:@M@Map.abstract: Returns distance user has traveled along current step.

Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/c:@M@Map.name: userDistanceToManeuverLocation
Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/c:@M@Map.abstract: Returns distance from user to end of step.

Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/c:@M@Map.name: distanceRemaining
Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/c:@M@Map.abstract: Total distance in meters remaining on current step.

Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/c:@M@Map.name: fractionTraveled
Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/c:@M@Map.abstract: Number between 0 and 1 representing fraction of current step traveled.

Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/c:@M@Map.name: durationRemaining
Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/c:@M@Map.abstract: Number of seconds remaining on current step.

Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/c:@M@Map.name: intersectionsIncludingUpcomingManeuverIntersection
Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/c:@M@Map.abstract: All intersections on the current RouteStep and also the first intersection on the upcoming RouteStep.

Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/c:@M@Map.name: upcomingIntersection
Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/c:@M@Map.abstract: The next intersection the user will travel through.

Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/c:@M@Map.name: currentIntersection
Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/c:@M@Map.abstract: The current intersection the user will travel through.

Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/c:@M@Map.name: intersectionDistances
Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/c:@M@Map.abstract: Returns an array of the calculated distances from the current intersection to the next intersection on the current step.

Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/s:16Mapb.name: userDistanceToUpcomingIntersection
Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/s:16Mapb.abstract: The distance in meters the user is to the next intersection they will pass through.

Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/c:@M@Map.name: visualInstructionIndex
Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/c:@M@Map.abstract: Index into step.instructionsDisplayedAlongStep representing the current visual instruction for the step.

Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/c:@M@Map.name: spokenInstructionIndex
Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/c:@M@Map.abstract: Index into step.instructionsSpokenAlongStep representing the current spoken instruction.

Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/c:@M@Map.name: currentSpokenInstruction
Classes/RouteStepProgress.html#/c:@M@Map.abstract: Current Instruction for the user’s progress along a step.

Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/c:@M@Mapb.name: remainingSteps
Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/c:@M@Mapb.abstract: The remaining steps for user to complete.

Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/c:@M@Mapb.name: distanceTraveled
Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/c:@M@Mapb.abstract: Total distance traveled in meters along current leg.

Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/c:@M@Mapb.name: durationRemaining
Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/c:@M@Mapb.abstract: Duration remaining in seconds on current leg.

Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/c:@M@Mapb.name: fractionTraveled
Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/c:@M@Mapb.abstract: Number between 0 and 1 representing how far along the current leg the user has traveled.

Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/c:@M@Mapb.name: stepBefore(_:)
Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/c:@M@Mapb.abstract: Returns the RouteStep before a given step. Returns nil if there is no step prior.

Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/c:@M@Mapb.name: stepAfter(_:)
Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/c:@M@Mapb.abstract: Returns the RouteStep after a given step. Returns nil if there is not a step after.

Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/c:@M@Mapb.name: currentStep
Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/c:@M@Mapb.abstract: Returns the current RouteStep for the leg the user is on.

Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/c:@M@Mapb.name: isCurrentStep(_:)
Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/c:@M@Mapb.abstract: Return bool whether step provided is the current RouteStep the user is on.

Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/c:@M@Mapb.name: nearbyCoordinates
Classes/RouteLegProgress.html#/c:@M@Mapb.abstract: Returns an array of CLLocationCoordinate2D of the prior, current and upcoming step geometry.

Classes/RouteProgress.html#/c:@M@MapboxN.name: currentLeg
Classes/RouteProgress.html#/c:@M@MapboxN.abstract: If waypoints are provided in the Route, this will contain which leg the user is on.

Classes/RouteProgress.html#/s:16MapboxNa.name: isFinalLeg
Classes/RouteProgress.html#/s:16MapboxNa.abstract: Returns true if currentLeg is the last leg.

Classes/RouteProgress.html#/c:@M@MapboxN.name: distanceTraveled
Classes/RouteProgress.html#/c:@M@MapboxN.abstract: Total distance traveled by user along all legs.

Classes/RouteProgress.html#/c:@M@MapboxN.name: fractionTraveled
Classes/RouteProgress.html#/c:@M@MapboxN.abstract: Number between 0 and 1 representing how far along the Route the user has traveled.

Classes/RouteProgress.html#/c:@M@MapboxN.name: distanceRemaining
Classes/RouteProgress.html#/c:@M@MapboxN.abstract: Total distance remaining in meters along route.

Classes/RouteProgress.html#/c:@M@MapboxN.name: remainingWaypoints
Classes/RouteProgress.html#/c:@M@MapboxN.abstract: Number of waypoints remaining on the current route.

Classes/RouteProgress.html#/s:16MapboxNa.name: TimedCongestionLevel
Classes/RouteProgress.html#/s:16MapboxNa.abstract: Tuple containing a CongestionLevel and a corresponding TimeInterval representing the expected travel time for this segment.

Classes/RouteProgress.html#/s:16MapboxNa.name: congestionTravelTimesSegmentsByStep
Classes/RouteProgress.html#/s:16MapboxNa.abstract: If the route contains both segmentCongestionLevels and expectedSegmentTravelTimes, this property is set to a deeply nested array of TimeCongestionLevels per segment per step per leg.

Classes/RouteProgress.html#/s:16MapboxNa.name: congestionTimesPerStep
Classes/RouteProgress.html#/s:16MapboxNa.abstract: An dictionary containing a TimeInterval total per CongestionLevel. Only CongestionLevel founnd on that step will present. Broken up by leg and then step.

Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html#/.name: routeController(_:shouldRerouteFrom:)
Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html#/.abstract: Returns whether the route controller should be allowed to calculate a new route.

Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html#/.name: routeController(_:willRerouteFrom:)
Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html#/.abstract: Called immediately before the route controller calculates a new route.

Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html#/.name: routeController(_:shouldDiscard:)
Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html#/.abstract: Called when a location has been identified as unqualified to navigate on.

Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html#/.name: routeController(_:didRerouteAlong:)
Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html#/.abstract: Called immediately after the route controller receives a new route.

Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html#/.name: routeController(_:didFailToRerouteWith:)
Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html#/.abstract: Called when the route controller fails to receive a new route.

Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html#/.name: routeController(_:didUpdate:)
Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html#/.abstract: Called when the route controllerâ€™s location manager receives a location update.

Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html#/.name: routeController(_:didArriveAt:)
Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html#/.abstract: Called when the route controller arrives at a waypoint.

Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html#/.name: routeController(_:shouldPreventReroutesWhenArrivingAt:)
Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html#/.abstract: Called when the route controller arrives at a waypoint.

Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html#/.name: routeControllerShouldDisableBatteryMonitoring(_:)
Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html#/.abstract: Called when the route controller will disable battery monitoring.

Classes/RouteController.html#/c:@M@Mapbo.name: directions
Classes/RouteController.html#/c:@M@Mapbo.abstract: The Directions object used to create the route.

Classes/RouteController.html#/c:@M@Mapbo.name: isDeadReckoningEnabled
Classes/RouteController.html#/c:@M@Mapbo.abstract: If true, location updates will be simulated when driving through tunnels or other areas where there is none or bad GPS reception.

Classes/RouteController.html#/c:@M@Mapbo.name: reroutesProactively
Classes/RouteController.html#/c:@M@Mapbo.abstract: If true, the RouteController attempts to calculate a more optimal route for the user on an interval defined by RouteControllerProactiveReroutingInterval.

Classes/RouteController.html#/c:@M@Mapbo.name: delaysEventFlushing
Classes/RouteController.html#/c:@M@Mapbo.abstract: When set to false, flushing of telemetry events is not delayed. Is set to true by default.

Classes/RouteController.html#/s:16Mapbox.name: tunnelIntersectionManager
Classes/RouteController.html#/s:16Mapbox.abstract: A TunnelIntersectionManager used for animating the use user puck when and if a user enters a tunnel.

Classes/RouteController.html#/c:@M@Mapbo.name: routeProgress
Classes/RouteController.html#/c:@M@Mapbo.abstract: Details about the userâ€™s progress along the current route, leg, and step.

Classes/RouteController.html#/c:@M@Mapbo.name: resume()
Classes/RouteController.html#/c:@M@Mapbo.abstract: Starts monitoring the userâ€™s location along the route.

Classes/RouteController.html#/c:@M@Mapbo.name: suspendLocationUpdates()
Classes/RouteController.html#/c:@M@Mapbo.abstract: Stops monitoring the userâ€™s location along the route.

Classes/RouteController.html#/c:@M@Mapbo.name: location
Classes/RouteController.html#/c:@M@Mapbo.abstract: The idealized user location. Snapped to the route line, if applicable, otherwise raw.

Classes/RouteController.html#/c:@M@Mapbo.name: recordFeedback(type:description:)
Classes/RouteController.html#/c:@M@Mapbo.abstract: Send feedback about the current road segment/maneuver to the Mapbox data team.

Classes/RouteController.html#/c:@M@Mapbo.name: updateFeedback(uuid:type:source:description:)
Classes/RouteController.html#/c:@M@Mapbo.abstract: Update the feedback event with a specific feedback identifier. If you implement a custom feedback UI that lets a user elaborate on an issue, you can use this to update the metadata.

Classes/RouteController.html#/c:@M@Mapbo.name: cancelFeedback(uuid:)
Classes/RouteController.html#/c:@M@Mapbo.abstract: Discard a recorded feedback event, for example if you have a custom feedback UI and the user canceled feedback.

Classes/RouteController.html#/c:@M@Mapbo.name: setEndOfRoute(rating:comment:)
Classes/RouteController.html#/c:@M@Mapbo.abstract: Set the rating and any comment the user may have about their route. Only used when exiting navigaiton.

Classes/RouteController.html#/c:@CM@Mapb.name: userIsOnRoute(_:)
Classes/RouteController.html#/c:@CM@Mapb.abstract: Given a users current location, returns a Boolean whether they are currently on the route.

Classes/RouteController.html.name: RouteController
Classes/RouteController.html.abstract: A RouteController tracks the userâ€™s progress along a route, posting notifications as the user reaches significant points along the route. On every location update, the route controller evaluates the userâ€™s location, determining whether the user remains on the route. If not, the route controller calculates a new route.

Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html.name: RouteControllerDelegate
Protocols/RouteControllerDelegate.html.abstract: The RouteControllerDelegate protocol provides methods for responding to significant events during the userâ€™s traversal of a route monitored by a RouteController.

Classes/RouteProgress.html.name: RouteProgress
Classes/RouteProgress.html.abstract: RouteProgress stores the userâ€™s progress along a route.

Classes/RouteLegProgress.html.name: RouteLegProgress
Classes/RouteLegProgress.html.abstract: RouteLegProgress stores the userâ€™s progress along a route leg.

Classes/RouteStepProgress.html.name: RouteStepProgress
Classes/RouteStepProgress.html.abstract: RouteStepProgress stores the userâ€™s progress along a route step.

Core Navigation Logic.html#/s:16MapboxNa.name: RouteControllerNotificationUserInfoKey
Core Navigation Logic.html#/s:16MapboxNa.abstract: Keys in the user info dictionaries of various notifications posted by instances

Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/c:@M@.name: isEnabled
Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/c:@M@.abstract: A boolean value indicating whether instructions should be announced by voice or not.

Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/c:@M@.name: instructionVoiceSpeedRate
Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/c:@M@.abstract: SSML option which controls at which speed Polly instructions are read.

Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/c:@M@.name: instructionVoiceVolume
Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/c:@M@.abstract: SSML option that specifies the voice loudness.

Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/c:@M@.name: playRerouteSound
Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/c:@M@.abstract: If true, a noise indicating the user is going to be rerouted will play prior to rerouting.

Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/c:@M@.name: rerouteSoundPlayer
Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Sound to play prior to reroute. Inherits volume level from volume.

Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/c:@M@.name: bufferBetweenAnnouncements
Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Buffer time between announcements. After an announcement is given any announcement given within this TimeInterval will be suppressed.

Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:16M.name: voiceControllerDelegate
Classes/RouteVoiceController.html#/s:16M.abstract: Delegate used for getting metadata information about a particular spoken instruction.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewControllerDidDismiss(_:byCanceling:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Called when the navigation view controller is dismissed, such as when the user ends a trip.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:didArriveAt:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Called when the user arrives at the destination waypoint for a route leg.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:shouldRerouteFrom:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Returns whether the navigation view controller should be allowed to calculate a new route.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:willRerouteFrom:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Called immediately before the navigation view controller calculates a new route.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:didRerouteAlong:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Called immediately after the navigation view controller receives a new route.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:didFailToRerouteWith:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Called when the navigation view controller fails to receive a new route.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:routeStyleLayerWithIdentifier:source:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Returns an MGLStyleLayer that determines the appearance of the route line.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:routeCasingStyleLayerWithIdentifier:source:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Returns an MGLStyleLayer that determines the appearance of the route lineâ€™s casing.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:shapeFor:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Returns an MGLShape that represents the path of the route line.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:simplifiedShapeFor:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Returns an MGLShape that represents the path of the route lineâ€™s casing.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:shapeFor:legIndex:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Returns an MGLShape that represents the destination waypoints along the route (that is, excluding the origin).

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:didSelect:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Called when the user taps to select a route on the navigation view controllerâ€™s map view.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:imageFor:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Return an MGLAnnotationImage that represents the destination marker.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:viewFor:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Returns a view object to mark the given point annotation object on the map.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewControllerDidOpenFeedback(_:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Called when the user opens the feedback form.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewControllerDidCancelFeedback(_:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Called when the user dismisses the feedback form.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:didSendFeedbackAssigned:feedbackType:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Called when the user sends feedback.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:mapViewUserAnchorPoint:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Returns the center point of the user course view in screen coordinates relative to the map view.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:shouldDiscard:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Allows the delegate to decide whether to ignore a location update.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: navigationViewController(_:roadNameAt:)
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: Called to allow the delegate to customize the contents of the road name label that is displayed towards the bottom of the map view.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/c.name: directions
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/c.abstract: An instance of Directions need for rerouting. See Mapbox Directions for further information.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/c.name: pendingCamera
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/c.abstract: An optional MGLMapCamera you can use to improve the initial transition from a previous viewport and prevent a trigger from an excessive significant location update.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/c.name: origin
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/c.abstract: An instance of MGLAnnotation representing the origin of your route.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/c.name: voiceController
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/c.abstract: Provides access to various speech synthesizer options.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/c.name: routeController
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/c.abstract: Provides all routing logic for the user.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/c.name: mapView
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/c.abstract: The main map view displayed inside the view controller.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/c.name: snapsUserLocationAnnotationToRoute
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/c.abstract: Determines whether the user location annotation is moved from the raw user location reported by the device to the nearest location along the route.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/c.name: sendsNotifications
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/c.abstract: Toggles sending of UILocalNotification upon upcoming steps when application is in the background. Defaults to true.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/c.name: showsReportFeedback
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/c.abstract: Shows a button that allows drivers to report feedback such as accidents, closed roads, poor instructions, etc. Defaults to true.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/c.name: showsEndOfRouteFeedback
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/c.abstract: Shows End of route Feedback UI when the route controller arrives at the final destination. Defaults to true.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/c.name: automaticallyAdjustsStyleForTimeOfDay
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/c.abstract: If true, the map style and UI will automatically be updated given the time of day.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/c.name: annotatesSpokenInstructions
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/c.abstract: A Boolean value that determines whether the map annotates the locations at which instructions are spoken for debugging purposes.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/c.name: init(for:directions:styles:locationManager:)
Classes/NavigationViewController.html#/c.abstract: Initializes a NavigationViewController that provides turn by turn navigation for the given route. A optional direction object is needed for potential rerouting.

Classes/NavigationViewController.html.name: NavigationViewController
Classes/NavigationViewController.html.abstract: NavigationViewController is fully featured, turn by turn navigation UI.

Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.name: NavigationViewControllerDelegate
Protocols/NavigationViewControllerDelega.abstract: The NavigationViewControllerDelegate provides methods for configuring the map view shown by a NavigationViewController and responding to the cancellation of a navigation session.

Other Global Variables.html.name: Other Global Variables
Other Global Variables.html.abstract: The following global variables are available globally.
